Autodesk.title: Autodesk Software Installation Guide
Autodesk.content:
Create account and get licence

Go to this Autodesk website. (Right click and open link in new tab)
Click Sign in on top right.




In the following Sign in page, click Create account.




Use your RMIT student email to create account.
The access to the software will automatically granted after registration.



                  
                  For students who have previously applied for an Autodesk education account: 
                  
                

Remember that your education account requires annual renewal. Please first check your email for any renewal notifications from Autodesk. You can renew your account through the link provided in the email, or by logging into the website in step 1 to complete the renewal process.


Download Software

Log in this Autodesk website again. (Right click and open link in new tab)
Select Revit.




In the next page, click Access products.
Now you will be directed to All Products and Services page.
Find Navisworks Manage and Revit, click on Install. This will trigger download of 2 tiny installers.





To install Revit and Navisworks Manage, begin by running the installer which will handle the downloading and installation of the software. This process may take some time to complete.



                  
                  Note that even if you choose to install Revit and Navisworks on a drive other than C:, these applications will still use a significant amount of space on the C:\ drive. It's advisable to free up some space on C:\ before starting the installation process. 
                  
                

Additional library for Revit

Bentley.title: Bentley Software Installation Guide
Bentley.content:
Create and setup account

















































































StepsTo do1Go to this Bentley education website. (Right click and open link in new tab)2Click Log in on top right.3In the following page, click Register now.4Create an account with RMIT student email address.5Check your e-mail (check the junk mail as well) for verification code. Enter the code and click the Verify button.6Sign in to your account7Youâ€™ll see this pop-up window. Click SETUP to update your profile8In the following page, click My Profile.9Fill the Bentley Education Profile (Fields marked with * are mandatory) and click the Save button.10Now the access to the software is granted
Download Software

































StepsTo do1While signed in, click Software on the top bar.2Under Structural Analysis, download and install RAM Structural System.3Under iTwin Products, download and install iTwin Capture Modeler.

Code-demo.title: Code demo

index.title: Welcome to OENG1191
index.content:
Hardware Requirements
To successfully complete OENG1191, you will need a Windows laptop. The course utilises numerous industry-specific software applications, many of which are only compatible with Windows and cannot be installed on the desktop computers provided by the uni. Additionally, having only a Windows desktop computer may pose challenges during group assignments. If you do not have access to a Windows laptop, it is recommended that you consider withdrawing from this course.
Software Requirements
Please ensure that you have the following software installed before the course begins:

Autodesk Revit and Navisworks Manage
Bentley RAM Structural System
Unity Engine
Revizto Platform

NCP Program
FAQ


                  
                  Do I need a powerful laptop? 
                  
                

No




                  
                  Do I need to know programming? 
                  
                

No




                  
                  Q3 
                  
                

No

No
